about_the_game:
Easy to Play, Stress-Free Fun!

Monster Clicker is a casual game that combines clicking, idle gameplay, and monster training. The controls are incredibly simple—just click to attack, heal, or upgrade your monsters!

  • If you’re a speed demon, focus on upgrading your "Fingertip" skill to make every click count!

  • Prefer a more relaxed pace? Train your monsters to fight automatically while you sit back and relax!

Diverse Monsters, Build Your Ultimate Team!

With 20+ unique heroes, each featuring multiple skins to unlock, the possibilities are endless!

  • Different skins not only look awesome but also come with unique stats and skills!

  • Your team consists of front, middle, and back rows. Strategically position your heroes to dominate the battlefield!

  • Assemble your dream team and create an unstoppable monster squad!

Rich Level Design, Challenge Your Limits!

Explore 100+ meticulously designed levels, each packed with surprises and challenges!

  • Journey through the Misty Forest, the Realm of Shadows Gorge, the Whirlwind Abyss, and the Silent Abyssal Sea—every stage offers a unique adventure!

  • Every battle is a fresh test of your strategy and skills!

Elemental Strategy, Master the Matchups!

Monsters in the game possess 9 different attributes, Wind, Thunder, Water, Fire, Earth, and more!, Water, Fire, Earth, and more!

  • Exploit elemental strengths and weaknesses to crush your enemies!

  • Strategic planning is the key to victory!

Hands-Free Progression, Upgrade with Ease!

Struggling against a tough opponent? No problem!

  • The idle mode lets you accumulate gold effortlessly. Take a tea break, and your monsters will grow stronger while you’re away!

  • Upgrade your monsters, enhance their skills, and dominate the competition with ease!

Join the World of Monster Clicker Today!

Whether you’re a casual player or a hardcore strategist, there’s something here for everyone!
Click, idle, train, strategize—all in Monster Clicker!

"Monsters at Your Fingertips" Trial Version: Includes 1 large map and 4 monsters with different styles. The trial version offers over 120 minutes of gameplay.

Note: Save files will not carry over to the full version. The full version will be released soon.
